cli.title: Claude Trace
cli.description: Record all your interactions with Claude Code as you develop your projects

help.extractToken: Extract OAuth token and exit (reproduces claude-token.py)
help.generateHtml: Generate HTML report from JSONL file
help.index: Generate conversation summaries and index for .claude-trace/ directory
help.runWith: Pass all following arguments to Claude process
help.includeAllRequests: Include all requests made through fetch, otherwise only requests to v1/messages with more than 2 messages in the context
help.noOpen: Don't open generated HTML file in browser (works with --generate-html)
